question: Who has been elected as the Deputy Chairman of Rajya Sabha?
explanation:
The candidate of National Democratic Alliance and Janata Dal (United) MP - Harivansh Narayan Singh has been re-elected as the Deputy Chairman of Rajya Sabha deputy chairman by a voice vote.
This is the second time he has been selected as the Deputy Chairman of Rajya Sabha. He defeated the opposition candidate Manoj Jha of Rashtriya Janata Dal.
